title: Font identification
content:
Hi all,

I’m trying to identify the font used in the attached jpg and have become cross-eyed looking through about 10,000 fonts within myfonts.com, about 7600 to go :-(

Would any one of you clever people recognise this? The font is imbedded in an image and I’m unable to contact the person who set it up for us.

Thanks in advance,  
Grace

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172627im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RefManagement_5645.jpg)

 [‹ Unborn: sans serif lower case in the 19th century](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172627/http:/typophile.com/node/46184 "Go to previous forum topic") [Better than @font-face: an open internet font service ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201172627/http:/typophile.com/node/46264 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Grace.Lowther
